thread.title: Oakwood Asia Pacific names GM to new Colombo property
thread.title_full: Oakwood Asia Pacific names GM to new Colombo property

author: eTN Editor
title: Oakwood Asia Pacific names GM to new Colombo property
text:
Oakwood Asia Pacific names GM to new Colombo property Adv: Tilome Nanayakkara Adv: 
SINGAPORE - Oakwood Asia Pacific Ltd., which serviced apartments for business and leisure travelers, today announced its expansion into Sri Lanka with the new Oakwood Apartments Colombo. The company also announced the appointment of the general manager for this new property.
